text:
The Catalog implementation should be able to load catalog entry files from the
CLASSPATH.  This is useful to web applications and libraries that supply
resources in the form of archives (.war & .jar).  This has the effect of
pointing the "base" URI for relative URIs into the archive (consistent, I think
with the spec), which means that cataloged identifiers can be mapped to bundled
resources.

I'd be glad to supply a patch, if that would be helpful.
creator: wassa@columbia.edu

text:
The Catalog implementation can load catalogs from locations on the class path,
including inside Jar files, but the names of the catalogs have to be specified
separately.

I think it would be a mistake to assume that all files called "catalog.xml" were
XML Catalog resolver catalogs.
